entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
